attributes.action: make the sport of bull riding legal in the uk as it is not animal cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for many years the rodeo sport of bull riding has been ilegal in the uk for no good reason it is not cruel to the animals as some would have us belive in fact the bulls used in bull riding are the best looked after bulls in the world and the bulls never get hurt during the rides
